<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; ThinLTO files. If the ThinLTO CodeGenerator can ensure that every</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; \\defgroup Cache controlling options</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; These entry points control the ThinLTO cache. The cache is intended to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; support incremental build, and thus needs to be persistent accross build.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; The client enabled the cache by supplying a path to an existing directory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; The code generator will use this to store objects files that may be reused</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; during a subsequent build.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; To avoid filling the disk space, a few knobs are provided:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;  - The pruning interval limit the frequency at which the garbage collector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;    will try to scan the cache directory to prune it from expired entries.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;    Setting to -1 disable the pruning (default). Setting to 0 will force</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;    pruning to occur.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;  - The pruning expiration time indicates to the garbage collector how old</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;    an entry needs to be to be removed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;  - Finally, the garbage collector can be instructed to prune the cache till</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;    the occupied space goes below a threshold.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; @&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/thinltocodegenerator/cachingoptions"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/thinltocodegenerator/cachingoptions">CachingOptions</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/thinltocodegenerator/cachingoptions/#aec4d0b35e16bcaf5522500a0e9b010e3"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::string <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/thinltocodegenerator/cachingoptions/#aec4d0b35e16bcaf5522500a0e9b010e3">Path</a>;                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Path to the cache, empty to disable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/thinltocodegenerator/cachingoptions/#a0c6cbe7cffe024542cc0447130db89a3"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cachepruningpolicy">CachePruningPolicy</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/thinltocodegenerator/cachingoptions/#a0c6cbe7cffe024542cc0447130db89a3">Policy</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Provide a path to a directory where to store the cached files for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// incremental build.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139" lineLink="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga13ac54ea2d670ae2b55c55d552ae2d2d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga13ac54ea2d670ae2b55c55d552ae2d2d">setCacheDir</a>(std::string Path) &#123; CacheOptions.Path = std::move(Path); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Cache policy: interval (seconds) between two prunes of the cache. Set to a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// negative value to disable pruning. A value of 0 will force pruning to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// occur.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144" lineLink="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga190f2d73ac70288b5323a0881fa0c727"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga190f2d73ac70288b5323a0881fa0c727">setCachePruningInterval</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/msf/mappedblockstream-cpp/#a4ab9bd667f674c16b2cee01ab8823644">Interval</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/msf/mappedblockstream-cpp/#a4ab9bd667f674c16b2cee01ab8823644">Interval</a> &lt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CacheOptions.Policy.Interval.reset();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CacheOptions.Policy.Interval = std::chrono::seconds(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/msf/mappedblockstream-cpp/#a4ab9bd667f674c16b2cee01ab8823644">Interval</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Cache policy: expiration (in seconds) for an entry.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A value of 0 will be ignored.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153" lineLink="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga5ba128cec363595b8cb8d403509b71d7"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga5ba128cec363595b8cb8d403509b71d7">setCacheEntryExpiration</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Expiration) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Expiration)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CacheOptions.Policy.Expiration = std::chrono::seconds(Expiration);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /&#42;&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; Sets the maximum cache size that can be persistent across build, in terms</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; of percentage of the available space on the disk. Set to 100 to indicate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; no limit, 50 to indicate that the cache size will not be left over</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; half the available space. A value over 100 will be reduced to 100, and a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; value of 0 will be ignored.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; The formula looks like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;  AvailableSpace = FreeSpace + ExistingCacheSize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;  NewCacheSize = AvailableSpace &#42; P/100</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171" lineLink="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga724a34dbf10eb5f09062e52237ea0e96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga724a34dbf10eb5f09062e52237ea0e96">setMaxCacheSizeRelativeToAvailableSpace</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Percentage) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Percentage)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CacheOptions.Policy.MaxSizePercentageOfAvailableSpace = Percentage;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Cache policy: the maximum size for the cache directory in bytes. A value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// over the amount of available space on the disk will be reduced to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// amount of available space. A value of 0 will be ignored.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179" lineLink="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga755ef880ddfb2ecdf8b5cae2d611dd78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga755ef880ddfb2ecdf8b5cae2d611dd78">setCacheMaxSizeBytes</a>(uint64&#95;t MaxSizeBytes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MaxSizeBytes)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CacheOptions.Policy.MaxSizeBytes = MaxSizeBytes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Cache policy: the maximum number of files in the cache directory. A value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// of 0 will be ignored.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186" lineLink="/docs/api/groups/cache/#gaca3298ccd1bd11e22a2119a0868177b4"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/cache/#gaca3298ccd1bd11e22a2119a0868177b4">setCacheMaxSizeFiles</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxSizeFiles) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /&#42;&#42;@&#125;&#42;/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"></CodeLine>
